General.Name: Inix Technologies Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Zen Tech International Berhad, an investment holding company, provides software development, system integration, and information technology management consultancy and other related professional services in Malaysia. It operates through Software and Books, Piling Works, Dredging, and Glove segments. The company also offers e-commerce solutions; dredging and land reclamation, as well as concrete and piling activities; and manufactures gloves, such as rubber, latex, and nitrile disposal gloves. The company was formerly known as Inix Technologies Holdings Berhad and changed its name to Zen Tech International Berhad in June 2022. Zen Tech International Berhad was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
